mapper.select: SELECT a.board_no , a.board_title , a.board_content , a.mem_id , b.mem_name , TO_CHAR(a.board_date, 'MM/dd HH:mm') AS board_date FROM boards a, members b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY a.board_no DESC
